Anticipation Tactics.name: Anticipation Tactics
Anticipation Tactics.fullText:
Talaric Strategist Attack 11Anticipation Tactics

Your tactical intuition places your ally just where he or she needs to be.

Encounter        Augmentable, Psionic
Immediate Interrupt      Close burst 3

Trigger: An enemy within 2 squares of you makes a melee attack

Target: One ally in the burst

Effect: The target can use a free action to shift 1 square and make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy. That attack deals 1d8 extra damage to the enemy.

Augment 2

  Target: One or two allies in the burst or you and one ally in the burst

  Effect: Each target can use a free action to shift 2 squares and make a basic attack against the triggering enemy.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 41.
Anticipation Tactics.flavor: Your tactical intuition places your ally just where he or she needs to be.
Anticipation Tactics.trigger: An enemy within 2 squares of you makes a melee attack
Anticipation Tactics.target: One or two allies in the burst or you and one ally in the burst
Anticipation Tactics.effect: Each target can use a free action to shift 2 squares and make a basic attack against the triggering enemy.

Combined Effort.name: Combined Effort
Combined Effort.fullText:
Talaric Strategist Attack 20Combined Effort

Drawing from your allies’ perceptions, you discern the best place to strike.

Daily        Psionic, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. AC. You gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each ally within 2 squares of the target.

Hit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Miss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 41.
Combined Effort.flavor: Drawing from your allies’ perceptions, you discern the best place to strike.
Combined Effort.attack: Charisma vs. AC. You gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each ally within 2 squares of the target.
Combined Effort.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Combined Effort.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Insightful Command.name: Insightful Command
Insightful Command.fullText:
Talaric Strategist Utility 12Insightful Command

You exhort your allies to move to new positions or to defend themselves.

Daily        Psionic
Minor Action      Close burst 5

Target: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: Each target can either shift half his or her speed as a free action or gain a +3 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 41.
Insightful Command.flavor: You exhort your allies to move to new positions or to defend themselves.
Insightful Command.target: You and each ally in the burst
Insightful Command.effect: Each target can either shift half his or her speed as a free action or gain a +3 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
